page.title: 01Auchenheath countryside
page.content: This 12km block is typical green agricultural land. Farming is mainly dairy with a little beef and small amounts of soft fruit. Auchenheath itself has only a small population of a few hundred people, most of whom are in the older age bracket.Young people tend to move away in search of employment. The villagers are commuters,working in Lanark and further afield in Motherwell and Glasgow. Services are limited,so the village is served by a mobile library, grocer and baker, mainly for the benefit of the older population.
